name: Shooting Master
overview: Gangster themed light-gun shooter. The title screen has a background animation of a princess, kidnapped from "castle land" by gangsters and carried to "gangster land". The first stage scrolls right, following the princess as she runs along a city street, away from the gangsters. You can be shot a number of times before losing a life, but are penalized with shots if you shoot the princess or if she is struck by a gangster. Other stages include a forest, warehouse and castle.
